description: Configures the leading frontmatter within a template file. Docs: https://moonrepo.dev/docs/config/template#frontmatter

force.title: force
force.description: Force overwrite a file at the destination if there is a conflict.

skip.title: skip
skip.description: Skip writing this file to the destination.

to.title: to
to.description: Override the destination using a relative file path.
